SELECT bg.id as id, bg.`NAME` as name, bg.category_id AS categoryId, bg.type as type, bg.buy as buy, bg.sales as sales, bg.unit_id AS unitId, bg.create_date AS createDate, bg.modify_date AS modifyDate FROM dj_basics_goods bg INNER JOIN dj_basics_product bp ON bp.goods_id = bg.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_brand bb ON bb.id = bp.brand_id INNER JOIN dj_basics_brand_series bbs ON bbs.id = bp.brand_series_id where 1=1
and bg.category_id=#{categoryId}
AND ( bp.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name}, '%' ) OR bb.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name}, '%' ) OR bbs.`name` LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{name}, '%' ) OR bp.`other_name` LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{name}, '%' ) )
GROUP BY bg.id ORDER BY bg.create_date desc

SELECT
FROM dj_basics_goods WHERE 1=1
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND category_id =#{categoryId}
